items.lore: Using an unorthodox method of smithing, these copper leggings are insulated with an extremely conductive blend of liquid to improve electrical discharge.
items.name: Conductor

items.lore: "We get a lot of weirdos coming from Gavel by airship. That plate mail looked unusably ornate!" -Calo, Private Airship Operator
items.name: Dead Samurai's Plate

items.lore: Brilliantly golden as the crops from the humble farm, its mere presence fills stomachs and brings comfort, but only to those who are modest and generous.
items.name: Katoa's Warmth

items.lore: "I just need a little more spider silk to finish this vest!" -Lacrona, Detlas Tailor, found eaten by Nivla spiders
items.name: Web Plate

items.lore: A centuries-old storm spirit was banished to these tight boots for his destructive actions. His fury empowers those who wear them with the great force of a raging cyclone.
items.name: Cyclo

items.lore: Long strips of chitin discarded from the mother of spiders Arakadicus still contain traces of her wicked powers, but few have survived the attempts to harvest them.
items.name: Arakadicus' Body

items.lore: "You should see when the spiders fight over a meal. It looks ridiculous, legs flailing everywhere!" -Captain Enduyn, Ragni Legion 1st Division
items.name: Stingy

items.lore: "...But under no circumstances should you stand directly behind an attacking spider. While not a universal trait, some spiders are capable of ejecting webs from their spinneret, leaving assailants and victims helpless." -Admiral Aegis' Guide To Nivla Threats, Chapter 3
items.name: Abdomen

items.lore: This ancient stone-hewn helmet is blended with the bones of an extinct animal of some kind. It is harder than dragon's hide.
items.name: Neolithic

items.lore: "...Spiders have a weak point in the cephalothorax, essentially the neck. A small target, but it isn't as tough to chop through as the rest of them. ..." -Admiral Aegis' Guide To Nivla Threats, Chapter 3
items.name: Spinneret

items.lore: Due to an unfortunate accident where he choked on a lemon, an unremarkable mercenary became a laughing stock. He later managed to shed the title, as he left no one alive who remembered the name.
items.name: Lemon Legs

items.lore: Forgotten long ago, these boots curse the wearer with an endless hunger.
items.name: Hunger

items.lore: "...Most of their vital organs, however, are located in the bulbous abdomen. If you've enough crushing force with your weapon, it may be a quicker alternative for the kill. ..." -Admiral Aegis' Guide To Nivla Threats, Chapter 3
items.name: Cephalothorax

items.lore: Plated with enchanted metals, these magic-warding boots allow faster travel over nearly any solid surface.
items.name: Omnitread Boots

items.lore: The one true Chimera in existence is sought by many, for great stories are told of its gifts to the worthy. One such gift was a simple fur coat, which gave the wearer but a taste of its power.
items.name: Chimaera

items.lore: "...as intimidating as the name sounds, you want your organs to be trapped in this kind of cage." -Excerpt from Human Anatomy For Fools, Cirh Nettan
items.name: Ribcage

items.lore: This helmet was worn long ago by an infamous assassin who plagued Bovemist sites for decades. It was crafted of the still-bloody skin of their most prized and worshiped cows.
items.name: Bovine Killer

items.lore: Made of an uncommonly used fabric called denim, these fashionable leggings exude style and elegance. Surely wearing them would bring you luck?
items.name: Opulenity

items.lore: A powerful mental curse surrounds these boots, inciting uncontrollable rage into the wearers, as well as the power to enact it upon others.
items.name: Audacity

items.lore: "I thought aiming for the legs would disable the enemy. Turns out they can drag themselves with their arms just as quick." -Therck, Ragni Soldier 3rd Division
items.name: Knee

items.lore: This peculiar shawl is eternally warm to the touch, and shimmers brilliantly in the sunlight. It is rumored to give amazing health benefits and good fortune to those who wear it.
items.name: Heliophilia

items.lore: The thick, Bovemist-sanctified cloth is worn by their priests during certain religious ceremonies. It clears the mind and purifies the body.
items.name: Blessed Wrappings

items.lore: Despite being only an impure scrap of the normally sturdy blackiron, these heavy leggings still have extreme defensive capabilities.
items.name: Darkiron Scrap

items.lore: The sweater has the quote "YELLOW- How's your Craftmas going" knitted onto the front.
items.name: Yellow Wynnter Sweater

items.lore: The sweater has the quote "SNOW way Craftmas can be bad in this sweater" knitted onto the front.
items.name: White Wynnter Sweater

items.lore: The sweater has the quote "Why be merry? CLAUS I said so" knitted onto the front.
items.name: Scarlet Wynnter Sweater

items.lore: The sweater has the quote "I'll never give you the COLD SHOULDER" knitted onto the front.
items.name: Red Wynnter Sweater

items.lore: The sweater has the quote "ICY you looking at my fancy duds" knitted onto the front.
items.name: Purple Wynnter Sweater

items.lore: The sweater has the quote "Going HAM on Craftmas dinner tonight" knitted onto the front.
items.name: Pink Wynnter Sweater

items.lore: The sweater has the quote "Let me NICK a few extra cookies for Craftmas" knitted onto the front.
items.name: Pine Wynnter Sweater

items.lore: The sweater has the quote "ORANGE you glad I showed up for Craftmas" knitted onto the front.
items.name: Orange Wynnter Sweater

items.lore: The sweater has the quote "GRAUPELING with a second helping of Craftmas feast" knitted onto the front.
items.name: Indigo Wynnter Sweater

items.lore: The sweater has the quote "I'm feeling PINE, what about you" knitted onto the front.
items.name: Green Wynnter Sweater

items.lore: The shirt has the quote "I went to the Letvus Airbase in Cinfras and all I got was this lousy T-shirt" printed on it.
items.name: Cinfras Souvenir T-Shirt

items.lore: The sweater has the quote "SLOPE to SKI you again next Craftmas" knitted onto the front.
items.name: Cerulean Wynnter Sweater

items.lore: The sweater has the quote "YULE see me smiling this season" knitted onto the front.
items.name: Brown Wynnter Sweater

items.lore: The sweater has the quote "Don't feel BLUE- It's Craftmas!" knitted onto the front.
items.name: Blue Wynnter Sweater

items.lore: The sweater has the quote "Prepare for a FLURRY of Craftmas spirit" knitted onto the front.
items.name: Black Wynnter Sweater

items.lore: The sweater has the quote "All STOCKINGED up for the season" knitted onto the front.
items.name: Beige Wynnter Sweater

items.lore: I helped!
items.name: Yellow Content Cap of Fame

items.lore: I found them!
items.name: Seekers Aid

items.lore: Not all who roam may find their way home. Others lose themselves in the world... And find a new way forward.
items.name: Mask of the Spirits

items.lore: I won!
items.name: Contest Wynner Cap

items.lore: An anomaly of separation, for the wanderers who seek purpose outside of reality.
items.name: Detachment

items.lore: An anomaly of destruction, for the conquerors who seek purpose outside of reality.
items.name: Breakthrough

items.lore: An anomaly of invasion, for the explorers who seek purpose outside of reality.
items.name: Ingress

items.lore: An anomaly of restriction, for the protectors who seek purpose outside of reality.
items.name: Forbearance

items.lore: An anomaly of replication, for the assemblers who seek purpose outside of reality.
items.name: Simulacrum

items.lore: An anomaly of adoption, for the caretakers who seek purpose outside of reality.
items.name: Collection

items.lore: "I pray that those who have heeded the wise one’s warning have survived. The canyon must not meet this fate."
items.name: Succession

items.lore: The runes carved into this simple gold cuff translate into various words meaning mastery. It amplifies the ability of the wearer in mysterious ways.
items.name: Prowess

items.lore: "All of our faith, all of our worship, and we were rewarded with the apocalypse."
items.name: Compliance

items.lore: "The lightest light will never defeat the darkest dark. Only those who understand both can survive."
items.name: Anya's Penumbra

items.lore: The jewel on this ring is found very rarely deep beneath the Light Forest. It has the power to manipulate light itself.
items.name: Prism

items.lore: "The protector will keep us safe even after this! It has to, it must, it—"
items.name: Obstinance

items.lore: The runes carved into this simple gold ring translate into various words meaning power. It amplifies elemental energies in inexplicable ways.
items.name: Intensity

items.lore: "The lucky ones perished in the abyss. It’s only a matter of time before the land picks us survivors off one by one."
items.name: Dispersion

items.lore: "The omens, the warnings, they were right there, and we stood by and did nothing."
items.name: Recalcitrance

items.lore: The jewels in this necklace naturally draw darkness and corruption into its wearer, purifying the land around them at the cost of their own life.
items.name: Planet Healer

items.lore: This medallion marks its wearer as a true champion. It is awarded to those who have put an unnecessary amount of time into attempting the Legendary Challenge.
items.name: Legendary Medallion

items.lore: The runes carved onto the gold beads strung along this simple necklace translate into various words meaning variance. It provides many abilities though unexplainable means.
items.name: Contrast

items.lore: "It's all doomed anyway. If you don't care, nothing can hurt you." - Zamugnia, Lost Lutho Citizen
items.name: Ambivalence

items.lore: "The fractures have ground the land to dust, our home to ruin, and our people to nothing."
items.name: Abrasion

items.lore: Power, but at what cost?

majorIds.name: Madness
majorIds.description: &b+Madness: &3Casts a random spell of your class every 3 seconds

items.name: Pandemonium

items.lore: An old Nemract saying is engraved along the metal. "A single toss of the knucklebones can make or break a gambling man."
items.name: Knucklebones

items.lore: \[Community Event Winner\] A fallen link from a chainmail hauberk of an older time, this ring fell from a giant taller than a mountain. As it sped through the air and  gained momentum, it traveled so fast that it was battered to a tenth of its size.
items.name: Downfall

items.lore: Sealed away by the Avos of the old days to prevent it from falling into the wrong hands, this necklace was enchanted to strengthen its wearers spiritual link to nature itself.
items.name: Necklace of a Thousand Storms

items.lore: Users who have worn this early model of the Steam Bracelet have reported that they have felt "one with the wind" while wearing it.
items.name: Silver Steam Bracelet

items.lore: Though it's hard to touch the simple, mechanical bracelet without experiencing a little shock, its capabilities intrigue you...
items.name: Silver Static Bracelet

items.lore: The device forged into this simple bracelet seems to gather heat. You feel a bit lukewarm when wearing it...
items.name: Silver Solar Bracelet

items.lore: You'll fight strong like the tide, the merchant said. Although you notice the built-in device's abilities, you feel space for an upgrade.
items.name: Silver Hydro Bracelet

items.lore: This bracelet, decorated with simple ornaments, uses built-in micro-devices to boost its users elemental abilites. There are many upgrades to be made before it reaches its full potential.
items.name: Silver Fusion Bracelet

items.lore: This rough looking bracelet utilizes electromagic to expose its wearer to earth's heartbeat. Though for now, it remains a whispering.
items.name: Silver Fiber Bracelet

items.lore: This impressive bracelet is in high demand. Those who have obtained it say that they feel as if they're "one with the wind" when wearing it.
items.name: Gold Steam Bracelet

items.lore: The painful shock coming from this improved version of the ring is a small price for its power, but it has yet to reach its peak.
items.name: Gold Static Bracelet

items.lore: The device forged into this improved bracelet seems to gather heat. You can feel a warming sensation all over your arm...
items.name: Gold Solar Bracelet

items.lore: You'll fight strong like the tide, the merchant said. Indeed, you begin to notice how your senses sharpen. But is that the limit...?
items.name: Gold Hydro Bracelet

items.lore: This bracelet, decorated with complex ornaments, uses built-in micro-devices to boost its users elemental abilites. Though powerful, there's still a lot to improve.
items.name: Gold Fusion Bracelet

items.lore: This rough looking bracelet utilizes electromagic to expose its wearer to earth's heartbeat. You can feel a rhythm with each step...
items.name: Gold Fiber Bracelet

items.lore: This steam-powered bracelet is sought by many challengers of the Legendary Challenge. They say that they feel as if they're "one with the wind" when wearing it.
items.name: Diamond Steam Bracelet

items.lore: The heavy shocks coming from this perfected bracelet would be lethal under normal circumstances, but the only thing its wearer senses is the enhancement of power.
items.name: Diamond Static Bracelet

items.lore: The device forged into this perfected bracelet drains all heat from its surroundings. Though it almost burns, you can feel your power growing
items.name: Diamond Solar Bracelet

items.lore: You'll fight strong like the tide, the merchant said, and no word was a lie. With this bracelet on your arm you could ride a wave with your bare feet.
items.name: Diamond Hydro Bracelet

items.lore: This bracelet opens up its wearers spirit, filling it with pure elemental knowledge. The ornaments decorating it are without peer.
items.name: Diamond Fusion Bracelet

items.lore: Desired by many of the countless challengers, this bracelet allows you to sense movements over thousands of meters away. It is decorated with rough yet beautiful jewels.
items.name: Diamond Fiber Bracelet

items.lore: An auxiliary power core of the powerful TERA-4M Mining robot line. It controls the robots by giving the bearer a compulsion to break new grounds and progress further without heed.
items.name: Summa

items.lore: This prototype model of the Steam Ring increases the user's agility in combat. The jewel of the ring is crystal clear.
items.name: Silver Steam Ring

items.lore: Though it's hard to touch the plain, mechanical ring without experiencing a little shock, its capabilities intrigue you...
items.name: Silver Static Ring

items.lore: The device forged into this simple ring seems to absorb heat. You feel a bit lukewarm when wearing it...
items.name: Silver Solar Ring

items.lore: You'll move quick like a river, the merchant said. Although you notice the built-in device's abilities, you feel space for an upgrade.
items.name: Silver Hydro Ring

items.lore: This ring, covered in colorful artifical gems, seems to awaken a strong elemental affinity in you. With some improvements to its core, it could become even better...
items.name: Silver Fusion Ring

items.lore: This crude looking ring utilizes electromagic to expose its wearer to earth's heartbeat. Though for now, it remains a whispering.
items.name: Silver Fiber Ring

items.lore: While this model of the Steam Ring is far superior to its predecessor, there still lies the capacity for one more upgrade. The jewel of the ring is crystal clear.
items.name: Gold Steam Ring

items.lore: The strong shock coming from this advanced version of the ring is a small price for its power, but it has yet to reach its peak.
items.name: Gold Static Ring

items.lore: The device forged into this advanced ring seems to absorb heat. You can feel a warming sensation all over your hand...
items.name: Gold Solar Ring

items.lore: You'll move quick like a river, the merchant insisted. Indeed, you begin to notice how your senses sharpen. But is that the limit...?
items.name: Gold Hydro Ring

items.lore: This ring, covered in colorful artifical gems, seems to awaken a powerful elemental force in you. Though stronger than the previous model, its true potential stays sealed.
items.name: Gold Fusion Ring

items.lore: This improved ring utilizes electromagic to expose its wearer to earth's heartbeat. You can sense a rhythm with each step...
items.name: Gold Fiber Ring

items.lore: Users of this perfect model of Legendary Island's steam-powered ring have reported feeling weightless in combat. The jewel of the ring is a perfectly clear diamond.
items.name: Diamond Steam Ring

items.lore: The heavy electrical impulses coming from this ring would be lethal under normal circumstances, but the only thing its wearer senses is pure power. A true masterpiece of engineering.
items.name: Diamond Static Ring

items.lore: The device forged into this flawless ring draws all heat from its surrounding. Though it almost burns, you can feel your abilites enhance.
items.name: Diamond Solar Ring

items.lore: You'll move quick like a river, the merchant said, and no word was a lie. With this ring on your finger, you could catch a gnat without looking.
items.name: Diamond Hydro Ring

items.lore: This mighty ring is the crown jewel amongst elemental rings. Wearing it, your knowledge is no longer limited to a few elements.
items.name: Diamond Fusion Ring

items.lore: This masterpiece of a ring utilizes powerful electromagic to expose its wearer to earth's heartbeat. Wearing it, you can feel a deep connection to the ground below.
items.name: Diamond Fiber Ring

items.lore: Elementally attuned gemstones are melded together to form the singular marvel found on this pendant. Despite the violent smithing process, the jewel is utterly flawless.
items.name: Stellar

items.lore: Despite the size of the large jewel hanging from this necklace, it doesn't feel heavy at all. However, the necklace's mechanisms seem incomplete.
items.name: Silver Steam Necklace

items.lore: Though it's hard to touch the plain, tech-enhanced necklace without experiencing a little shock, its capabilities intrigue you...
items.name: Silver Static Necklace

items.lore: The device forged into this basic necklace seems to gather heat. You can feel a warm sting when holding it.
items.name: Silver Solar Necklace

items.lore: You'll be wise like the sea, the merchant said. Although you notice the built-in device's abilities, you feel space for an upgrade.
items.name: Silver Hydro Necklace

items.lore: This necklace, decorated with bright jewels, uses built-in micro-devices to boost its users elemental abilites. There are many upgrades to be made before it reaches its full potential.
items.name: Silver Fusion Necklace

items.lore: This crude looking necklace utilizes electromagic to expose its wearer to earth's heartbeat. Though for now, it remains quiet.
items.name: Silver Fiber Necklace

items.lore: The jewel hanging from this necklace is said to be weightless. While still very powerful, its full potential has yet to be achieved.
items.name: Gold Steam Necklace

items.lore: The strong shock coming from this improved version of the necklace is a small price for its strength, but it has yet to reach its peak.
items.name: Gold Static Necklace

items.lore: The device forged into this advanced necklace seems to gather heat. You can feel a warming sensation all over your neck...
items.name: Gold Solar Necklace

items.lore: You'll be wise like the sea, the merchant said. Indeed, you begin to notice how your senses sharpen. But is that the limit...?
items.name: Gold Hydro Necklace

items.lore: This necklace, decorated with bright jewels, uses advanced nano-technology to boost its users elemental abilities. Though powerful, there are still a few flaws to be fixed.
items.name: Gold Fusion Necklace

items.lore: This improved version of a bracelet utilizes rare electromagic to expose its wearer to earth's heartbeat. You notice a rhythm with each step...
items.name: Gold Fiber Necklace

items.lore: This necklace is the pinnacle of steam-powered technology. Despite the size of the large jewel hanging from the necklace, it doesn't feel heavy at all.
items.name: Diamond Steam Necklace

items.lore: The lethal amount of electricity emmited from this often desired necklace fails to kill you, as its pure energy runs through your veins.
items.name: Diamond Static Necklace

items.lore: The masterpiece of a necklace gathers all heat from its surrounding. It is fed to its wearer to maximize the strength of attacks.
items.name: Diamond Solar Necklace

items.lore: You'll be wise like the sea, the merchant said and every word was true. With this necklace equipped, you could hear the ocean whisper.
items.name: Diamond Hydro Necklace

items.lore: Unlike any other invention this necklace enhances your power and understanding of the elements tenfold. The colorful jewels used are almost dizzying you.
items.name: Diamond Fusion Necklace

items.lore: This ultimate version of a necklace was given to less than a handful of adventurers. Once on your neck, you can communicate with the ground below as if you grew roots.
items.name: Diamond Fiber Necklace

majorIds.name: Coagulate
majorIds.description: &b+Coagulate: &3Blood Connection launches you further and higher upon teleporting to a nearby totem

items.lore: \[Community Event Winner\]
items.name: Esclavage

items.lore: The mangled body found days too late apparently thought this necklace would let them traverse between geysers into the Upper Heights.

majorIds.name: Lunge
majorIds.description: &b+Lunge: &3Hop's horizontal velocity is greatly increased

items.name: Daredevil

items.lore: \[Community Event Winner\] Gentle spirits of the wind attract themselves to the brilliant jewels slotted into this ring, bringing peace to its wearers and those around them.
items.name: Kaze

items.lore: \[Community Event Winner\] This small, rough-crafted pendant is the only known magic artifact of the Orcs. It incites destructive tendencies within the wearer.
items.name: Shatterglass

items.lore: A lost relic from the Wind Fortress, a mythical stronghold of the Sky Islands that fell into the Void long ago. A small mechanism within the bracelet points towards its place of origin.
items.name: Follow the Wind

items.lore: This bracelet is awarded to participants of the Legendary Challenge. Its modular design allows it to be upgraded in a number of different ways.
items.name: Bronze Basic Bracelet

items.lore: This ring is awarded to participants of the Legendary Challenge. Its modular design allows it to be upgraded in a number of different ways.
items.name: Bronze Basic Ring

items.lore: This necklace is awarded to participants of the Legendary Challenge. Its modular design allows it to be upgraded in a number of different ways.
items.name: Bronze Basic Necklace

majorIds.name: Entropy
majorIds.description: &b+Entropy: &3Meteor falls three times faster

items.lore: The cloth wraps produced by the canyon Dojo are just that, merely soft cloth. It is left to the users to apply them skillfully in battle, in whatever way they see fit.
items.name: Jiandan Handwraps

items.lore: Even simply looking at these odd rings gives way to a compulsion to wear two of them, despite all better judgement.
items.name: Black Catalyst

items.lore: Found on the corpse of the oldest shopkeeper of the Gavel province, the engraved text reads 'GREED'.

majorIds.name: Greed
majorIds.description: &b+Greed: &3Picking up emeralds heals you and nearby players for 15% max health

items.name: Old Keeper's Ring

items.lore: Revel in the respect you've finally earned.
items.name: Veneration

items.lore: Your success heralds the beginning of something new.
items.name: Provenance

items.lore: Let their souls sing your chorus of victory.
items.name: Cacophony

items.lore: May your triumphs live eternal and never fade.
items.name: Athanasia

items.lore: Come to terms with your godlike judgment.
items.name: Reckoning

items.lore: What you have seen will mark you forever.
items.name: Metamorphosis

items.lore: Even looking at this pendant strains your eyes. Should it even exist?
items.name: Altum Spatium

items.lore: Aldorei charms are often shared and tinkered with by gifted Elves within the commune. Though simple, the stones blessed by elven magic provide soothing energy to the wearer.
items.name: Adder Stone

items.lore: This golden cuff has an odd time dilation effect surrounding it, slowing all movements significantly, but multiplying the force of impact to a significant degree.
items.name: Momentum

majorIds.name: Lightweight
majorIds.description: &b+Lightweight: &3You no longer take fall damage

requirements.quest: Realm of Light V - The Realm of Light

items.lore: This strange pendant has been known to dilate time around the wearer, slowing their movements while greatly augmenting their power.
items.name: Tenuto

majorIds.name: Freerunner
majorIds.description: &b+Freerunner: &3When your sprint bar is under 30% full, increase your sprint speed by +150%

items.lore: \[Community Event Winner\]
items.name: Gospel

items.lore: A recently married man went off to war wearing this wedding ring. Though he perished in battle, his courage and determination empowers all who wear it.
items.name: Martyr

items.lore: Feeling the fresh chill of the cold air is all you need to know you're really alive.

majorIds.name: Flashfreeze
majorIds.description: &b+Flashfreeze: &3Ice Snake is instant and freezes for +1s

items.name: Cold Wave

items.lore: An exclusive amulet given to the most honored knights of Wynn. It pulsates with a calming aura.
items.name: Royal Stormy Amulet

items.lore: An exclusive amulet given to the most honored knights of Wynn. It crackles with a chaotic energy.
items.name: Royal Shocking Amulet

items.lore: An exclusive amulet given to the most honored knights of Wynn. It shines with a powerful strength.
items.name: Royal Dusty Amulet

items.lore: An exclusive amulet given to the most honored knights of Wynn. It whistles with an invigorating tune.
items.name: Royal Cyclone Amulet

items.lore: An exclusive amulet given to the most honored knights of Wynn. It glows with a comforting warmth.
items.name: Royal Blazing Amulet

items.lore: The scholar-priest Ensa created this pendant as a personal prayer while his home was under siege. It is rumored to hold the key to enlightenment, but it is unknown as to how.
items.name: Ensa's Faith

items.lore: The stellar quality of the coral jewels set into the ring comes from a magical purification process, involving a decade-long soak in mystical Gylia water.
items.name: Marvel

items.lore: Used by the Order of the Abyss to aid their summoning rituals, it contains a strange, fiery energy. It has ties with a terrible demon...
items.name: Abyssal Amulet

items.lore: \[Community Event Winner\]
items.name: Anarchy

items.lore: This plain-looking silver bracer is one of the last surviving heirlooms of the first Gavellian king, to be passed down to his heirs. The shimmering metal is said to contain Remikas' soul within it.
items.name: Remikas' Authority

items.lore: The wielders of this cursed glassen bauble are rendered mute. The effect is reversed after the item is removed, but the longer it is worn, the longer the curse remains.
items.name: Unspeakable

items.lore: \[Community Event Winner\] Reverberating with the bravery and residual strength of fallen Wynn soldiers, every casualty only serves to harden the resolve it instills in the wearer.
items.name: Call to Concord

items.lore: Stability is not necessarily found in stasis, but predictability.
items.name: Homeorhesis

items.lore: In the wake of the Decay, the land yearns to return to its old vibrance.
items.name: Atavistic

items.lore: Survival is the shared interest of those in the wilds.
items.name: Symbiont

items.lore: The Decay swept away countless species. As those memories die, they are lost forever.
items.name: Extinction

items.lore: A presence of despair watches over the swamp as the Decay spreads.
items.name: Eyes on All

items.lore: Something must always rule the ecosystem, even one as warped as this.
items.name: Apex Predator

items.lore: Created from the lip of a wine bottle and dropped in the mystic waters of Lake Gylia, this glass ring seems to follow Rycar's drunken escapades wherever she wanders.
items.name: Rycar's Elation

items.lore: The magical oddity known as lodestone has been studied for years as an active counterpart to quartz's passive magical properties. Research continues, but it is valuable when creating magical items.
items.name: Lodestone

majorIds.name: Taunt
majorIds.description: &b+Taunt: &3Mobs within 12 blocks target you upon casting War Scream

items.lore: \[Community Event Winner\]
items.name: Luminis

items.lore: Although the warlock's curse placed upon this simple, Olux-crafted charm will reduce the abilities of the wearer significantly, its original luck-bolstering properties still are in place.
items.name: Hexed Amulet

items.lore: An oppressively dark aura emanates from this shackle, dampening both the will and magic potency of those that wear it.
items.name: Binding Brace

items.lore: \[Community Event Winner\]
items.name: Oyster

items.lore: The extra metal on the glove completely defeats the purpose... It's unclear why it was re-smithed like this.
items.name: Weighted Nimble Fingers

items.lore: Each one is welded stuck to just one letter. Apparently, to decode the special Rymek message, you need to buy twenty six. ...do they think you're a fool?
items.name: Sticky Decoder Ring

items.lore: A strange magic attracts you to this ring. Maybe you shouldn't tell anyone about its existence?
items.name: Precious

items.lore: The glass capsule holding the poison vial is too cloudy to see what's inside. The merchant's reassurances are anything but.
items.name: Diluted Vitriol

items.lore: The silver looks rather tarnished...does he expect you to believe that "gem" isn't just a cheap glass bauble?
items.name: Broken Sandust

items.lore: Undecipherable symbols are carved into this long arm band, though the fiery glow and bright jewel has led archaeologists to believe it is somehow related to the sun.
items.name: Ra

items.lore: The merchant insists the gem is real. It's easy to tell that the issue is the quality of the gem, though...
items.name: Dulled Amethyst Ring

items.lore: It looks like someone tried and failed to improve it. The re-smithing job was obviously rushed...
items.name: Cracked Stonehall

items.lore: There are little chips and cracks all over this... was someone trying to break it down for gold?
items.name: Chipped Glitz

items.lore: It's completely impossible to use this for its intended purpose now. It barely can fit on your finger as is.
items.name: Misshapen Libella

majorIds.name: Magnet
majorIds.description: &b+Magnet: &3Pulls items dropped by mobs towards you

items.lore: It looks more like a dog paw to you, but you don't feel like risking your life arguing with the merchant.
items.name: Used Wolf Paw

items.lore: An uncountably old relic of Time Valley which has changed owners only through death, there is an inscription carved on it: '⒠⒜⒯ ⒪⒭ ⒝⒠ ⒠⒜⒯⒠⒩'
items.name: Law of the Jungle

items.lore: "After the Nivla forest fire, I'm glad the corrupteds haven't thought to try and burn the Detlas Suburbs." -Sergeant Klafson, Detlas Legion
items.name: Field

items.lore: "They say the eyes are the windows to the soul. That's ridiculous, ocular fluids are primarily opaque." -Ragon, Elemental Researcher
items.name: Vitre

items.lore: Carried by the Durum Protector, this small necklace holds but an ounce of the vibrance and life of the Durum Isles.
items.name: Durum's Serenity

items.lore: A mighty, earth-shatteringly powerful weapon was destroyed for fear of its raw power, and the pieces buried. They were unearthed decades later, and were reforged into various items including this sturdy bracer.
items.name: Buster Bracer

items.lore: "Crawly things. They crawl on the mushrooms. Mushrooms shouldn't be crawly!" -Yahya, Mushroom Man
items.name: Spider Ring

items.lore: "My dear boy should never have to go through the horrors of losing a mother like that." -Momo, adoptive mother of Bob
items.name: Witherhead's Talisman

items.lore: Although not truly magical by any means, the sheer craftsmanship of this ornate broach makes its wearers feel skillful.
items.name: Master

items.lore: The forger of this ring had to endure 30 long days of smelting various metals only found in the ocean. A single mistake would ruin the creation. The mystic metals are said to seep into the wearers skin to gently replenish their resolve.
items.name: Concentration

items.lore: Being one of the absolute rarest treasures in the world, it seems to have a mind of its own, only showing itself when a stroke of luck is had.
items.name: Rarity

items.lore: Thank you for participating in Wynnterfest 2016!
items.name: Wynnterfest 2016 Souvenir

items.lore: Thank you for participating in the 2017 Wynnter Fair!
items.name: Wynnter Fair 2017 Souvenir

items.lore: Thank you for participating in the 2016 Wynnter Fair!
items.name: Wynnter Fair 2016 Souvenir
